resources.string: The "EMI Calculator" application is intended for entertainment purposes only. The app uses an algorithm to compare your photo with images of celebrities from our database and provides a similarity score based on facial features. However, the results are not guaranteed to be accurate or scientifically verified.
The application does not imply any endorsement or relationship between you and the celebrities identified in your results.
Your uploaded photos and personal information will be handled in accordance with our Privacy Policy and will not be shared with third parties without your consent.
The applicationâ€™s results are for amusement and novelty purposes only and should not be taken as factual or definitive statements regarding your likeness to any celebrity.
The application and its database may be updated from time to time, which could not impact the results of your matches.
